scripts.build:together: npx tsx ./scripts/scaffold.ts && npm run build:mainnet & npm run build:staging & npm run build:experimental
scripts.build:all: npm run build:together && npx tsx ./scripts/reorganize.ts && npx tsx ./scripts/sitemap.ts
scripts.preview:experimental: tsx ./scripts/scaffold.ts && npm run build:experimental && vitepress preview ./docs-experimental
scripts.preview:staging: tsx ./scripts/scaffold.ts && npm run build:staging && vitepress preview ./docs-staging
scripts.preview:mainnet: tsx ./scripts/scaffold.ts && npm run build:mainnet && vitepress preview ./docs-mainnet
